description:
Ronaldo and Draluc go into Bubuo`s dream, Yakyuken Lover has a run-in with Koyuki`s dad, and Draluc`s grandfather visits Shin-Yokohama.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le pays des rêves Bboland / Papa et le chelou / Hello, How Are You? Tu t`ennuies ?
Utopia Bboland / Dad and the Suspicious Person / Hello, How Are You? Are You Free?
Yume no Kuni Bboland / Otousan to Fushinsha / Hello How Are You Ima Ohima?
夢の国BBOLAND / お父さんと不審者 / ハロー・ハワユー・いまおヒマ?
